description: This file defines a React functional component named RecipeGrid that renders a responsive grid of RecipeCard components. It manages display logic for empty states and handles interactions such as selecting, favoriting, editing, or deleting recipes.

methods.name: RecipeGrid
methods.description: React functional component that renders a grid of recipes, handling empty states and user interactions.

ctags.name: RecipeGrid
ctags.pattern: /^const RecipeGrid = ({ items, onSelect, isFavorite = () => false, onToggleFavorite = () => {}, on/
